xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: This work was supported in part (A. K. and K. T.) by the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC) of Canada.

organization.$: Jordan University of Science and Technology

head.citation-title: Quaternionic vector coherent states and the supersymmetric harmonic oscillator
head.abstracts: The quaternionic vector coherent states are realized as coherent states of the supersymmetric harmonic oscillator with broken symmetry in analogy with the standard canonical coherent states of the ordinary harmonic oscillator. We study the nonclassical properties of the oscillator, such as the photon number distribution and signal-to-quantum-noise ratio in terms of these states and discuss the squeezing properties and the temporal stability of the coherent states. We obtain the orthogonal polynomials associated with the quaternionic vector coherent states. © Springer Science+Business Media, Inc. 2006.
